item.title: Spice World Hot Pot enhances menu in honor of 1st anniversary celebration
item.description:
Source: Spice World Hot Pot. Tender milk beef. Spice World Hot Pot, a restaurant recognized for its creative food presentations, high-quality ingredients, and attentive service, is commemorating its first anniversary in Singapore with exciting new dishes at its spacious 200-seat location. One standout offering is the “Bullish Day” platter (牛气冲天, S$36.90), which showcases various cuts of sliced beef, tripe, and tongue. Diners can also enjoy traditional handmade beef balls (牛肉丸, S$15...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/spice-world-hot-pot-enhances-menu-in-honor-of-1st-anniversary-celebration/
